name: RAINBOW
nutshell:
Six minors (16 - 17 years) answering to the nicknames of Joe, Mario, Suppon, Baremoto, Heitai, and Kyabetsu are put into a reformatory for offenses such as aggravated assault, swindling, flight, etc. Their stay in hell begins immediately. Accommodated by a doctor pedophile, they are placed under the watch of a despotic and brutal crew. Cellmates with a certain Sakuragi (called Anchan), the tension rises between the band of buddies and their new "friend." A brawl breaks out, and our six prisoners are done rossés by the mysterious young man, thanks to his boxing talent.
The story will not only follow the lives of these seven characters surviving in their hellish environment, but also their disillusions due to the rejection by the outside world and by their close relations. This is about the extraodinary and invincible friendships between these young men.
Rainbow received the 2005 Shogakukan Manga Award for the seinen/general category along with A Spirit of the Sun.

Official Release:

Indonesian release by Level Comics

name: Devil's Contract
nutshell: "You can't control where you're born. You can only accept it." This rings true for Koi Orgakon, a young demon who dreams of seeing the world above the flames. Being born among the fiery pits of hell, she's trained for centuries at the Demi Corp academy to receive a contract to leave. But when graduating last in her class proves to have its setbacks her dream seems unlikely to be accomplished; until a stroke of good luck sends her on her way to her heaven...or another living hell. Join Koi during her battles to free herself from not only her past, but the world around her.

name: Kanjuku Summer End
nutshell: Tae helps with her family's tomato field. However, when Gen, a ruffian-looking boy from Tokyo, is sent to help with the field, it seems that a sweet love will also be ripening.

name: All the Girls in the Cultivation World Want a Piece of Me
nutshell: I, Xia Yi, have the Congenital Cultivation Body, and can master any and all techniques under heaven, and would be able to improve the constitution of any woman who dual-cultivates with me. But what will happen to a person who has the Congenital Cultivation Body and hasn't become strong yet? Of course, he'll be sought after by all the women who want to use him as a cultivation tool!

name: Captain Tsubasa
nutshell:
11-year-old Tsubasa Ohzora transfers to his new school where he quickly becomes the star of the school's soccer team. His Brazilian coach, Roberto Hongo, notices the potential of the young athlete and soon offers him a chance to come with him to Brazil. Young Tsubasa trains more and more and is with each passing game more confident in his abilities. Old enemies become his friends and the World Cup seems closer and closer for him.

Official Release:

Indonesian release by Elex Media

name: Philia Rose - The Prophecy of the Crown of Thorns
nutshell:
Stop the rebellion of the Priest and Prince Paeryun!
Philia, a priestess who has the ability to read the other person's mind, is tasked by the High Priest to 'stop Leo Elion's rebellion.'
He was once a promising prince of the kingdom of Elion.
Leo, who has become a prince who dreams of rebellion, proves that the prophecy announcing the ruin is true.
You have to persuade him to stop the war so that the kingdom can be safe. This was the mission of salvation given to the young priestess one day
Will Philia be able to tame this wild beast of a  prince?

name: Libido Effect
nutshell: Graduate students Garib and Jinjoo, who study insects, are a couple who have been dating for a long time since they were freshmen. Boredom comes to them, who have lived together for over 3 years. One day, trembling in fear that Garib would leave him, Jinjoo stung a finger at an unknown insect, Libidine, who had just entered the laboratory. Jinjoo suddenly starts to get an erection in front of Garib, who reassures him that nothing will happen, and Garib, a graduate student who is passionate about this unusual phenomenon, begins to glow. Meanwhile, their advisor 'Coral' and assistant 'Bada' also find out Libidine's secret. They embark on a plan to use Libidine to fuck each other...

name: Kuuchuu Teien no Hitobito
nutshell:
Collection of Toume Kei's oneshot work from 2011-2016.

ELEMENT 7
コビト事情 (Fairy Affairs)
Apartment of the Dead
夕闇古書市 (The Twilight Antique Book Market)
天国のドア (Heaven's Door)
青密花 (Blue Secret Flower)

name: The Fairy Tale in the Cat's Heart
nutshell: Two heroines, abandonment, fetters, growth. Sai is a "sister", an orphan who was raised by a wild cat when she was a child, and was taken away to become the first "cat" of the manor. Seringa is the "sister", the daughter of a wealthy businessman, who was sold by her parents to the manor to pay off her debts and became the second "cat", Sai is constantly searching for freedom, expecting to live with the real "like", and facing the fleeing Sai, Seringa grabs her by the throat - "You and I are the same, you should be with me."

name: To Match a Villainess: Love Hunting Rhapsody
nutshell: In her past life, everyone knew her as the villainess of Nan City, but they didn’t know that she was just a reckless support-character. After she was set up, lost all her reputation, and died in the streets, she returned through reincarnation. In this lifetime, she decided to embrace the identity of the villainess that they believed her to be. She would not let the real villains get off scot-free!

name: The House of the Cute Devil
nutshell: A cold devil is using her efforts to survive society for the goal of being able to be rich by enhancing her spiritual powers(not really) she clearly doesn’t have dating experience but what’s with the handsome guy that she can’t get rid of? cool police with the tiger type, a superstar with the dog type, millionaire with the wolf type … there ought to be one that fits you (right?)

name: Helter Skelter
nutshell:
Through round after round of extensive plastic surgery and vigorous maintenance, Ririko has become the absolute manifestation of beauty, and becomes a wildly successful model, actress, and singer. However, soon, her body, unable to withstand the burdens of surgery, begins to crumble, and along with it so does her mind, as she plummets towards a frightening and inevitable end.
Helter Skelter won the 2003 excellence prize at the Japanese Media Arts Festival, and the 2004 Osamu Tezuka Culture Prize.

name: Ramen Aka Neko
nutshell: Tamako comes for an interview at a ramen shop run only by cats, with no humans. The cat manager asks her if she likes cats, and when Tamako honestly says she is a dog person, she is easily hired. However, her job is not to run a ramen shop, but to look after cats...?

name: DAGASY - Houkago Chounouryoku Sensou
nutshell:
Ooba Asa woke up one morning and became an invisible man. It isn't just him, but various students around school have been gaining superpowers while his little sister has been losing the same powers. Supposedly the student council president is giving out superpowers, Ooba Amime's powers, so Asa, Amime, and the grudge-filled flame girl, Daimon Yaki, form an uneasy alliance to defeat the mysterious student council president.
Wikipedia

name: Sankaku Mado no Sotogawa wa Yoru
nutshell: Shy bookstore clerk Kosuke Mikado has the ability to see ghosts and spirits, an ability he wishes he didn’t have, since what he sees usually terrifies him. Rihito Hiyakawa, an exorcist whose supernatural powers are as strong as his social graces are weak, doesn’t seem to fear anything, mortal or otherwise. When this odd couple gets together to solve the bizarre cases that come their way, their work methods may not be entirely safe for work!

name: I Love You More Than Ever
nutshell: Yu Lan had tirelessly loved sheng youting for 11 years, despite his lack of reciprocation and her feeling inferior in the relationship. When she finally couldn't take it anymore and let go of him, it hurt her so much that it almost cost her life. She had gotten so used to loving Sheng Youting that without him, she would never feel complete...

name: Shin Slayers - Falces no Sunadokei
nutshell:
After being shipwrecked on a remote southern island, Lina and Co. protect its townspeople from an attack by pirates…. But the island holds a deep, dark secret - and powerful magical forces are at work trying desperately to hide its past. The fate of the world once again rests in the hands of the over-bearing Lina Inverse… For better or worse!
Join Lina, Gourry Gabriev, Zelgadiss Greywords, Amelia Wil Tesla Seyruun, and introducing Luke and Millena on a brand new adventure!

name: Urara no Pantsu wa Tenchou wo Komaraseru
nutshell: The part-timer is more interested in honeypotting than working! Sumiyoshi is the new manager of a family restaurant with the worst sales. He wants to rebuild the restaurant and get a promotion, but he's confronted by Urara, the kitchen manager, who plays tricks on him to make his life easier; Ai, the big-boobed girl in the hall who's planning to become the manager behind the scenes; and Ayano, the serious but quirky part-timer who leaves work early because she's in high school.

name: Yogoreteru Hima Nanka Nai
nutshell: Matsumi Sachiko's always searching for love in the wrong places. She's made more blunders in the love department than she can count over the years, and things just never seem to go well for her. She's quick to sleep with others in her search for that special someone only to regret it later. Lately, her luck's taken an even bigger turn for the worst when the guy she'd started to have feelings for asked her if she wanted to become his "sex friend"! Will she ever find "the one"?

name: Tales of Guard
nutshell:
Después de que 5 grandes guerras azotaran al mundo, los pa� ses con mas de 300 años de historia de guerras no pod� an controlar a sus guerreros, ellos no deseaban nada mas que la batalla, pero debido al cambio drástico que tuvo el imperio del pa� s ganador de la ultima guerra "Vailor", no dejaron muy contento a los miles de soldados, esto tras declarar la paz con 7 pa� ses del mundo y as� dejando atrás una posibilidad de nueva gran guerra. Esto genero una ola de cr� menes en los diferentes pa� ses, es por esto que el Rey de Vailor en conjunto con sus consejeros y el Gran General de Guerra, idearon un sistema donde los guerreros frustrados al no poder pelear mas por su pa� s, pod� an ocupar sus habilidades en combate para poder acabar con la ola crimina y as� ayudar a los civiles del pa� s, para convertirlo en un lugar mas seguro, este sistema fue una especie de gremio donde los guerreros que se un� an a el pod� an aceptar diferentes misiones para ayudar personas, el sistema no era la gran cosa, pero tuvo mas aceptación de la esperada y as� el pa� s de Vailor decido esparcir estos gremios a lo largo del pa� s, los cuales fueron llamados "Casas de Guardias" y los soldados que formaban parte de una pasaron a llamarse como "Guardias", esta idea se hizo muy famosa donde poco después fue exportada a otros pa� ses y poco a poco luego de 4 años desde que esa idea se empleo, muchas Casas de Guardias a lo largo del pa� s fueron naciendo, desde pequeñas a grandes, desde famosas a irreconocibles y diferentes tipos.
Es aqu� donde el Protagonista Kylem Abarac de 16 años, llega a una pequeña Casa de Guardias llamada : Kuroi Yama, en donde planea ingresar, lo que no sabe es que una gran aventura, nuevos compañeros y nuevas experiencias le esperan.

name: Hiratsu Cute, Shizu Cute!
nutshell:
Hiratsuka-sensei not being able to get married is wrong as expected!
Follow the chemistry between Hachiman and Hiratsuka-sensei in this Oregairu doujin by Twitter user @poipoipoita.

name: Pink
nutshell: Pink is a manga about a Japanese girl named Yumi, a beautiful girl in her early 20s. During the day, Yumi works as a regular office lady, but by night, she works as a prostitute. Yumi needs her two jobs to make ends meet. She also needs the extra income to feed her unusual pet, a crocodile, which she keeps in her apartment. Working in an office is quite normal for young Japanese women, but keeping a pet crocodile, and being a prostitute makes Yumi stand out. In truth, few girls are like Yumi, however, many readers can empathize with her. Young women love their "something," symbolized by her pet crocodile, and they can also identify with Yumi's "wild at heart" nature.

name: Touhou - vaearca (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Marisa x Reimu doujin.

name: Shadowman
nutshell:
Short story published in Comic OZ vol.01, in 1985.
The shadow of a man creeps upon Jessie. Is it real or merely a figment of her imagination ? Or perhaps, something else…?

name: Knight of Rakshasa
nutshell: After a great earthquake that happened 17 years ago, the citizens of Indonesia were greatly affected. They got infected by mysterious creatures and transformed into ferocious monsters called Rakshasa. Khrisna and Aura are two agents with special powers who will fight chaos and save the world

name: Soda Water of August
nutshell:
(from mangaupdates):
Tales of the unusual residents staying in an equally unusual seaside town. Also includes the additional story "Uwa no Sora ga Oka Yori."

name: Nejimage Factor
nutshell:
What would happen if ecchi accident tropes were caused by some kind of illness?
Could be used as some kind of weapon?
Join the Mc to see what happens
"Ecchi stuff that also may have a story…."

name: Pei Bao
nutshell: When Gu Bao went bankrupt, he noticed the cold-hearted Big Bro Pei’s attitude had a 180-degree change but he seemed a little over enthusiastic… When Gu Bao had a girlfriend, only then Pei Ting realized he had slowly fallen in love with Gu Bao after befriending him… “Hey, did you not know that you were flirting with me all along? How could you simply call me Big Bro?”

name: Houkago Wind Orchestra
nutshell: Yoshotoshi Heion was a 1st year high school student who had no desire to excel–and liked it that way. In fact he chose Hiyotani High school for that reason. It was an average school only 5 minutes from his house. There's even a cute girl in his class, Rina Fujimoto, and he's already given up on her. But Rina wants to join the "Wind Orchestra Club" (Brass Band Club) only to learn it's been disbanded. Rina's passion for music inspires Yoshotoshi to help revive the club. "Once you make the first step… Who knows what will happen?"
